header.title: How to remove an Eclipse plugin

body.p: To remove an Eclipse plugin go through the following steps:

ol.li: Disable the feature: go to Help > Software Updates > Manage Configuration. Select the plugin/feature which needs to be disabled and select disable on the right. Restart Eclipse.

Uninstall the feature/plugin: after the restart go Manage Configuration and select the disabled feature/plugin. Select uninstall on the right. If the disabled plugin is not visible then press the button in the top button bar 'Show disabled Features'.
